name: Piano Sonata No. 1
description: Max Randal's first completed composition is a sonata for solo piano in three movements, with a performance time of about 15 minutes. (Op. 1, 2018)

name: Fantasy No. 1
description: A piece for trombone and piano, expressing the joy of returning home for the summer. Performance time is about 5 minutes. (Op. 2, 2018)

name: Seasons
description: A solo piano cycle of the four seasons, with plentiful references to associated melodies and ideas from the composer's life. Performance time is about 13 minutes. (Op. 4, 2018)

name: When early morn walks forth
description: A choral SATB setting of a powerful poem by William Blake. Performance time is about 4 minutes. (Op. 6, 2019)
